arts.ttl: Portugal v Republic of Ireland, Spain v Georgia: World Cup 2026 qualifying – live
arts.sum: ⚽️ World Cup qualifying news from 7.45pm BST kick-offs ⚽️ Live scoreboard | Follow us on Bluesky | Mail John Jarell Quansah will miss England’s World Cup qualifier against Latvia due to injury and the defender – who did not play a part in England’s 3-0 friendly win over Wales at Wembley – will return to his club Bayer Leverkusen. England did not reveal the nature of his injury but the 22-year-old has returned to the Bundesliga club as a precaution. The former Liverpool defender has been a mainstay in Leverkusen’s defence this season but England said no further squad additions were planned for the qualifier in Riga on Tuesday. Thomas Tuchel’s side top their World Cup qualifying group with a perfect record from five games while Latvia are fourth in the standings. Continue reading...
